doc.field: Series D.III. New York City Buildings, Parks and Other Cityscapes (2002 and later)
Series D.III. New York City Buildings, Parks and Other Cityscapes (2002 and later)

Includes: 1) Upper West Side: taxis on Broadway at about 70th Street (April); 2) SoHo: Deli on corner of Spring and Green Streets; 3) Lower Manhattan: Lafayette Street looking south; 4) Door of a taxi with fare rates; 5) SoHo: Tenement building with fire escapes at Kenmare Street near Lafayette; 6&7) Chinatown; 8&9) Chinatown: bakery neon signage (2006 or 2007); 10) top of Woolworth Building (2006 or 2007); 11) SoHo: Subway entrance at Spring and Lafayette streets. All November unless noted.
Series D.III. New York City Buildings, Parks and Other Cityscapes (2002 and later)
